oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Intramolecular coordination in tellurium chemistry
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SUDHA, N
SINGH, HB
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: x-ray structure
molecular-structure
organotellurium compounds
crystal-structure
3-(arylchalcogeno)propenoyl chlorides
containing heterocycles
te-125 nmr
= me
derivatives
ligands
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Intramolecular coordination in organotellurium derivatives is reviewed. The various types of complexes are discussed according to the types of donor atoms involved. Structural and spectroscopic evidence in support of intramolecular coordination, where Te(II) and Te(IV) behave as Lewis acids, is emphasized.
